---
title: "blastula-multiple-images"
author: "ccg"
date: "7/20/2018"
output: html_document
rmd_output_metadata:
  rsc_email_attachments:
    - plot1.png
    - plot2.png
  rsc_email_subject: "Blastula Example with Multiple Images"
---

```{r}
library(blastula)

png(filename = "plot1.png")
plot(1:10)
dev.off()

png(filename = "plot2.png")
plot(15:10)
dev.off()

email <- compose_email(
  body = "
    Here is an image to look at:
  
    {add_image('plot1.png')}

    Here is another one:

    {add_image('plot2.png')}
    
    Cheers
    ")

# Send the HTML email to RStudio Connect
rmarkdown::output_metadata$set(rsc_email_body_html = email$html_str)
rmarkdown::output_metadata$set(rsc_email_images = email$images)
```
